General.Name: LFE Corporation Bhd
General.Description: LFE Corporation Berhad, an investment holding company, provides construction, mechanical, and electrical services in Malaysia. It operates through Construction, Mechanical and Electrical; Property Development; Investment; and Others segments. The company provides specialized engineering services for extra low voltage electrical systems; and instrumental and control systems for intelligent transport system applications, such as expressway traffic management, tunnel plant and traffic management, and automatic cash transfer systems. It also engages in the distribution of consumer electronics products; and provides design and implementation of general and specialized electrical and mechanical engineering services, and maintenance works. In addition, the company is involved in the property development and construction; and construction works and project management, as well as project management consultancy; property investment; and general contracting activities. Further, it provides consultancy and installation service to embedded with sensors, software, and other technologies; and internet of things services. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
